call_summary: The customer called to book a roundtrip first class flight from LAX to Paris. The CSR assisted in finding flight options, confirmed the itinerary details, and booked the flights.
key_takeaways: Customer was frustrated with the website and process.
Customer wanted first class tickets with extra legroom and meals.
Flights were booked LAX to Paris departing 14th at 7pm, returning Paris to LAX departing 21st at 3:45pm.
follow_up_actions: Email customer the flight itinerary and e-ticket numbers.
Charge $9,550 to card on file for ticket purchase.
